extendedInfo.description: Discover the most crazy racing / platform game on Google Play! Twisted circus is a highly addictive game for all audiences that will change your habits.  Choose your favourite character among ten and only listen to your courage to dive headlong into roller coasters as fast as crooked! RACE HAS NEVER BEEN SO DIZZY * An intuitive gameplay: one button to jump, a button to be upside down. * Avoid the pitfalls, grab all the coins, and finish every level as soon as possible to earn 3 stars. * We know the characters are professional toons but please try to stay on the track! Crashing too often is bad for their health... 2 GAME MODES * In the Gift Mode, grab all the gift-wrapping hidden in each level before the time runs out. * In the Race mode, avoid all the pitfalls to cross the finish line in the allotted time. HOURS OF FUN !!! * Discover the 45 levels with more to come in the future updates. * 3 ultra colorful universes for your viewing pleasure. * Don't forget to complete the different achievements to become a champion. * At any time, you can face an enemy your ghost (a virtual character corresponding to your best score). A NEW GENERATION 2 PLAYERS MODE !! * No matter where you are, you can confront the ghosts of friends or those of the best players in the world. And above all, grab all the coins placed in levels to get new characters and items!"It Might Be the Most Crazy & Challenging Action Game on Google Play" -- Editor Pick's AppEggs.com
